main.name: Jesse Hauck
main.description: Full Stack developer seeking opportunities to grow and develop my skillset with a growth oriented company.
main.bio: I'm relatively new to coding but I'm always strving to improve my skill! My main interest is backend development although I sometimes do some frontend coding as well. I love probelm solving and being part of a team!
main.contactmessage: If you have any questions or would like to talk further feel free to send me message!

education.description: This was a 6 month coding bootcamp provided by Case Western. I learned full stack web development

work.description: My team created a mobile app that tracked a user's daily fitness goals. The user would put money on the line to motivate themselves to reach their goals. If they didn't achieve their fitness goals the money would be donated to a charity of their choosing. We used a combination of Node, JavaScript, React and babel.
I did the majority of the 6 month bootcamp entirely online.

projects.title: Password Generator
projects.category: A simple app the outputs a random password based on user inputs

projects.category: An app that grabs the current 5 day forecast and then recommends events to go to in your area
